extensionDescription.message:
Create, modify and quickly change tab groups. 
Inspired by the old add-on "Tab Groups" :)

setTabIconAsGroupIcon.message: Set tab icon as group icon
setTabIconAsGroupIcon.description: Set tab icon as group icon

moveTabToGroupMessage.message:
Tab "$tabtitle$" was moved to group "$grouptitle$".

Click here to show this tab.

privateAndPinnedTabsAreNotSupported.message: Private and pinned tabs are not supported
privateAndPinnedTabsAreNotSupported.description: Private and pinned tabs are not supported

confirmDeleteLastGroupAndCloseTabs.message: Deleting this group will close all current tabs!
confirmDeleteLastGroupAndCloseTabs.description: Deleting this group will close all current tabs!

invalidRegExpRuleTitle.message: Rule '$regexp$' is not valid and it will be skipped.

showNotificationAfterMoveTab.message: Show notification when tab is moved to another group
showNotificationAfterMoveTab.description: Show notification when tab is moved to another group

showConfirmDialogBeforeGroupDelete.message: Show confirm dialog before group delete
showConfirmDialogBeforeGroupDelete.description: Show confirm dialog before group delete

exportAddonSettingsDescription.message: Export your tab groups into a backup file for safe-keeping, so that you can restore them at a later time if necessary.
exportAddonSettingsDescription.description: Export your tab groups into a backup file for safe-keeping, so that you can restore them at a later time if necessary.

includeTabThumbnailsIntoBackup.message: Include tab thumbnails into backup (make backup file size bigger)
includeTabThumbnailsIntoBackup.description: Include tab thumbnails into backup (make backup file size bigger)

importAddonSettingsDescription.message: Load a backup file containing the tab groups you want to restore.
importAddonSettingsDescription.description: Load a backup file containing the tab groups you want to restore.

importAddonSettingsWarning.message: Restore add-on settings will ERASE all existing settings and groups!
importAddonSettingsWarning.description: Restore add-on settings will ERASE all existing settings and groups!

importSettingsOldTabGroupsAddonDescripti.message: Load a backup file old "Tab Groups" addon.
importSettingsOldTabGroupsAddonDescripti.description: Load a backup file old "Tab Groups" addon.

importSettingsOldTabGroupsAddonButton.message: Import settings from Quicksaver's "Tab Groups" add-on
importSettingsOldTabGroupsAddonButton.description: Import settings from Quicksaver's "Tab Groups" add-on

openGroupAfterChange.message: Open group after changing to it
openGroupAfterChange.description: Open group after changing to it

showGroupIconWhenSearchATab.message: Show group icon when search a tab
showGroupIconWhenSearchATab.description: Show group icon when search a tab

showUrlTooltipOnTabHover.message: Show url tooltip when hovering over tab
showUrlTooltipOnTabHover.description: Show url tooltip when hovering over tab

searchTabNotFoundTitle.message: Search for tabs for "$search$" not found

deleteGroupBody.message:
Do you want to delete group "$name$" ?
Group removing also close tabs and tied window if it's open now!

selectUserGroupIconWarnText.message:
Sorry, you can't load custom icon in this popup, but you can load custom group icon in "Manage groups".
Open "Manage groups"?
selectUserGroupIconWarnText.description:
Sorry, you can't load custom icon in this popup, but you can load custom group icon in "Manage groups".
Open "Manage groups"?

catchTabContainers.message: Catch and move tabs with containers to this group (only for web urls, empty tabs are not supported)
catchTabContainers.description: Catch and move tabs with containers to this group (only for web urls, empty tabs are not supported)

regexpForTabsHelp.message:
Insert regular expressions for web addresses here. Matching tabs will be moved automatically to this group.
Use one line per rule, there can be as many as you want.
Examples:
github\.com/drive4ik/simple-tab-groups - catch all pages in the add-on's repository
bugzilla\.mozilla\.org - catch Firefox bug reports
(facebook|twitter|youtube)\.com - catch all your social pages

hotkeysDescription.message:
Here you can add hot keys.
Restrictions:
1. These hotkeys will only work on web pages (http:, https:). On the browser pages (about:) - it's doesn't work, the WebExtensions API does not allow this.
2. Some hotkeys will not work in different keyboard layouts. For example, the shortcut created in English layout Ctrl + ~ will not work on the Russian layout, because in Russian layout this key has another code. To fix this, just create another hotkey on the Russian layout: Ctrl + –Å

whatsWrongMessage.message:
Whats wrong...
Please contact with developer by support email with last error logs (exist button at bottom of options)
whatsWrongMessage.description:
Whats wrong...
Please contact with developer by support email with last error logs (exist button at bottom of options)

saveErrorLogsIntoFile.message: Save last error logs into JSON file
saveErrorLogsIntoFile.description: Save last error logs into JSON file

isStickyGroupHelp.message: Tabs in this group will never be automatically moved to another group
isStickyGroupHelp.description: Tabs in this group will never be automatically moved to another group

useTabsFavIconsFromGoogleS2Converter.message: Use tabs fav-icons from Google S2 Converter
useTabsFavIconsFromGoogleS2Converter.description: Use tabs fav-icons from Google S2 Converter

discardTabsAfterHide.message: Discard tabs after hide (this will save the RAM)
discardTabsAfterHide.description: Discard tabs after hide (this will save the RAM)

createThumbnailsForTabs.message: Create thumbnails for tabs (used in the "Manage groups")
createThumbnailsForTabs.description: Create thumbnails for tabs (used in the "Manage groups")

thisTabCanNotBeHidden.message: This tab can not be hidden because it uses a microphone or camera
thisTabCanNotBeHidden.description: This tab can not be hidden because it uses a microphone or camera

notPossibleSwitchGroupBecauseSomeTabShar.message: It is not possible to change the group because one of the opened tabs share microphone or camera
notPossibleSwitchGroupBecauseSomeTabShar.description: It is not possible to change the group because one of the opened tabs share microphone or camera

foundHiddenUnSyncTabsDescription.message: Found hidden unsynchronized tabs. Click on tab to show it into current group/window or:
foundHiddenUnSyncTabsDescription.description: Found hidden unsynchronized tabs. Click on tab to show it into current group/window or:

actionHiddenUnSyncTabsMoveAllTabsToCurre.message: Move all of this tabs into current group/window
actionHiddenUnSyncTabsMoveAllTabsToCurre.description: Move all of this tabs into current group/window

actionHiddenUnSyncTabsCreateGroup.message: Create new group with all of this tabs
